career.title: Isikhungo Sokukhulisa Umsebenzi
career.subtitle: Izindlela ezihleliwe zobuholi bomndeni, ubuchiko bokusebenza, kanye nomthelela webhizinisi ngaphakathi kwe-Salatiso ecosystem.

learning.title: I-Sazi Life Academy Hub
learning.subtitle: Okuhlangenwe nakho kokufunda okukhethiwe ukuthuthukisa ubuholi bomndeni, ubugcisa bebhizinisi, kanye nomthelela womphakathi.

timeline.title: Isikhathi Sokwenza
timeline.subtitle: Landela isigqi sokukhiqiza somndeni. Isigaba ngasinye sihlanganisa ukusebenza, ukufunda kanye nezinyathelo zokuxoxaâ€”ezisekelwe embandekanweni we-Ubuntu kanye nezinhloso zebhizinisi.

lifecv.title: Isikhungo Sokuqashelwa Se-LifeCV
lifecv.subtitle: I-LifeCV iyirekhodi eliphilayo lobuholi belungu ngalunye lomndeni, umthelela webhizinisi, kanye nokusebenzela umphakathi. Yigcine isesikhathini ukuze uvule ukuqashelwa, ukulalela ukufunda, kanye nezindlela zemali.

ecosystem.title: Izinhlelo Zokusebenza Ze-Ecosystem
ecosystem.subtitle: Umgogodla wedijithali ohlanganisiwe osekela amabhizinisi omndeni, izinhlelo zomphakathi, kanye nezindlela zokusebenza zokulawula i-Ubuntu.

homepage.hero_description: I-Mlandeli Notemba Investments iyinkampani ephethe umndeni ye-ecosystem ye-Salatiso - igcina i-Sazi Life Academy, i-Homestead OS, i-LifeKey, kanye namalungelo obunikazi alindelekile anika amandla efa lethu lezizukulwane eziningi.
homepage.hero_subtext: Okuqale njengezincwadi kanye nezindatshana ze-Salatiso.com manje kuphila njenge-intranet yomndeni, i-academy yokufunda, kanye nenkundla elungele abalingani ebuyisela indaba yomuntu ngamunye ekhaya ngaphansi kokuphathwa kwe-MNI.
homepage.ubuntu_description: Isisekelo sethu sakhiwe kufilosofi ye-Ubuntu - inkolelo yokuthi ubuntu bethu buxhumene futhi sifeza amandla ethu aphelele ngomphakathi kanye nokusekelana komuntu nomuntu.
homepage.family_description: Sonke isinqumo, umkhiqizo, kanye nokubambisana kubeka phambili ukuchuma komndeni kanye nokwakha ifa lezizukulwane eziningi.
homepage.innovation_description: Sisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ukuxazulula izinkinga zangempela zemindeni kanye nomphakathi kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika.
homepage.impact_description: Amabhizinisi ethu aklanyelwe ukudala ushintsho oluhle olulinganisekayo emfundweni, ekuxhotshisweni kwezomnotho, kanye nasekuthuthukisweni komphakathi.
